thread.title: Paymentvision Announces Participation at Upcoming September Conferences
thread.title_full: Paymentvision Announces Participation at Upcoming September Conferences

author: Eugene O'Rourke
title: Paymentvision Announces Participation at Upcoming September Conferences
text:
PaymentVision , a leading provider of PCI-compliant electronic payment gateway services, has been named a sponsor at two conferences upcoming conferences in September:
Vertican vConference 2015, September 2-4 in Denver, CO Columbia Ultimate: Art of Success – Rediscover 2015, September 21-25 in Sunriver, OR
Each conference is specifically designed for anyone who uses, supports or administers the Columbia Ultimate and Vertican solutions, including CLS, Q-Law, and YCG. Each conference offers a number of sessions of strategic and practical content, and upcoming product features. Attendees will also have ample opportunity for networking and enjoying beautiful landscapes of Denver and Sunriver.
“We are very excited to again be participating in this year’s vConference and Art of Success events,” said Eugene O’Rourke, Vice President of Marketing. “Both conferences are great ways of allowing users to experience PaymentVision’s products, directly with one of our experienced payment processing consultants. Our newest solution allows merchants to offset transaction processing costs by leveraging convenience fees for self-serve payment channels. Additionally, these events are strong opportunities for attendees to learn more about their software systems and their respective industries.”
For more than 25 years, PaymentVision has been dedicated to providing clients across several industries – including auto finance, utilities and insurance – access to a number of reliable payment processing tools. PaymentVision’s suite of tools provide the ability to accept all forms of payment online – and in person – in an efficient and secure manner.
To learn more about PaymentVision’s integrated electronic payment solutions, visit us at booth #10 at vConference 2015 or booth #3 at Rediscover 2015.
About PaymentVision
PaymentVision is a biller-direct, PCI-compliant, electronic payment gateway provider. PaymentVision offers clients the unified ability to accept ACH, check, and credit or debit card payments, by phone, or through Internet channels. PaymentVision solutions handle billions of dollars for thousands of financial institutions, large and small nationwide including, credit unions, banks, consumer finance, and collection agencies. For more information, please visit http://www.paymentvision.com ; follow PaymentVision on Twitter @PaymentVision or on Facebook at http://www.facebook.com/paymentvision ; or call 800-345-7243.
About Autoscribe Corporation
Autoscribe Corporation is a leading financial services company and payment processor. With more than two decades of innovation and leadership in the financial technology industry, Autoscribe offers a full suite of tools through PaymentVision and Lyons Commercial Data to help their customers grow their business, simplify payment processing, mitigate risk, and ensure compliance. Recently named to the Inc. 5000 as one of the fastest growing private companies in the nation, Autoscribe has 2,000 customers and processes more than $1 billion in transactions annually. For more information, please visit http://www.autoscribe.com ; follow Autoscribe on Twitter @AutoscribeCorp or on LinkedIn at http://www.linkedin.com/company/autoscribe ; or call 800-345-7243.
